product.title: Pongo and Perdy | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Pongo and Perdy

In this heartwarming tale, Pongo the Dalmatian is frustrated by his owner, Roger, an absentminded songwriter who is too wrapped up in his music to pay Pongo much attention. Pongo decides to begin the hunt for a wife for Roger, selecting a “perfect lady” at the park who just happens to have a beautiful Dalmatian named Perdy. Pongo employs clever tricks to get Roger and the lady to fall in love, and is thrilled when his tactics work. Pongo and Perdy find love, too, and become the proud parents of a litter of ten puppies. This wholesome story reinforces the comfort and togetherness of family.

Tie-in Activity: Page through a family photo album with your child, pointing out familiar faces and asking her to identify how they are related. Also encourage her to think of a favorite memory she’s shared with each person.
